entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking up at Hermione with disgust. He is also mentioned as saying something to Harry about Lockhart being smarmy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as sleeping under her pillow and is spared answering Ron's question by Madam Pomfrey.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is introduced as sweeping over with her evening dose of medicine and saving Hermione from answering Ron's question.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is mentioned by Ron as being smarmy.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as giving Harry a lot of homework.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as thinking he will be in the sixth year before finishing his homework and as listening to Filch's outburst with Ron.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is introduced as making an angry outburst from the floor above.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is mentioned as being where Harry and Ron are heading.

relationships.description: Ron looked up at Hermione with disgust.
Ron mentioned Lockhart as being smarmy.
Snape gave Harry a lot of homework.
Ron asked Hermione how many rat tails were supposed to be added to a Hair-Raising Potion.
Harry listened to Filch's outburst with Ron.
